programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways… or else!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways… or else!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time

Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.desc: Amanda Finley will stop at nothing to keep her son Jackson from marrying Olivia, who she suspects of being after his money.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Boy Amores
programme.desc: A former policeman defies the law and meets a violent death.

programme.title: Kumukulong Dugo
programme.desc: Kumukulong Dugo

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak Ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Kuwatog
programme.desc: Child sensation Niño Muhlach plays the lovable dwarf "Kuwatog." As punishment for his many pranks, he is transformed into a human child, here to remain until he does a deed that will benefit mankind.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 157
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Eco Eats
programme.desc: Nothing beats eco eats! Astrid Jorgensen, founder of Pub and Couch Choir, and Paul Iskov, owner of roaming restaurant Fervor, join Adam to make sustainable and attainable recipes!

programme.title: This Place - Baga Mountain
programme.desc: After years of fighting, two mountains in Central Queensland have been given back their traditional names. Aunty Sally, and Nhayla Nicky share why the Darumbal Community fought so hard for this change.

programme.title: Australia In Colour - Episode 1
programme.desc: This episode charts the story of the nation from 1896 to 1929 as agriculture transforms the land.

programme.title: Landline: India - Cotton
programme.desc: A trade deal opens up new partnerships, cotton and wool grown in Australia, made in India and exported to the world and; supplying a demand for almonds, avocadoes and wine to a new generation with a taste for new food.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Pajinka, Broome, Sunraysia
programme.desc: Aaron takes a trip to the tip of mainland Australia, Ernie reconnects with an old friend in Broome and Narelda gets a taste of the Sunraysia region with chef Stefano de Pieri.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 24
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Eco Eats
programme.desc: Nothing beats eco eats! Astrid Jorgensen, founder of Pub and Couch Choir, and Paul Iskov, owner of roaming restaurant Fervor, join Adam to make sustainable and attainable recipes!

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: In Portland, Texas, a terminally ill woman is visited by a familiar spirit. Ghost hunters talk to the dead in one of America's most haunted villas. A UFO flies by campers in Castell, Texas.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A young woman is brutally attacked on the train by an assailant; a coach witnesses a student with a gun roam the hall; a store clerk faces a suspect trying to rob him with an unusual weapon.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: An auto parts store owner turns the tables on an armed assailant by taking his gun; an armoured car driver survives a terrifying attack; a hotel clerk flips the script on an armed robber. And more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: When three people are gunned down in a Tulsa home, detectives face two suspects, and a web of lies. Prosecutors are left with circumstantial evidence to clinch the case against a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: The peaceful town of Mountain City, TN, is rocked when a beloved young couple is found brutally murdered in their home.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant wants a hip-hop superstar to be his lawyer; a man is convicted in a murder-for-hire plot; a woman attacks her attorney in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A man in custody attempts a daring escape from court; a sovereign citizen argues with a judge about laws; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A defendant announces college baseball scores during his murder trial; a man facing drug charges gets caught smoking marijuana in the virtual courtroom; a domestic violence suspect threatens a judge.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A road rage suspect attacks a bailiff in court; a grieving mother screams at the hit-and-run driver who killed her daughter; a jury bungles the sentencing phase of a murder trial; and more.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Sheriff Dance meets the two new volunteers before Orion enters the program. Jamil and Drip go head-to-head while there is aggression in the women's pod force. Brittany and Sara to try to find a solution.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S1)
programme.desc: When the Singapore Police need help, they turn to Lim Chin Chin, the Director of Forensic Chemistry and Physics Laboratory.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S1)
programme.desc: Watch how cyber-sleuths like Erik Laykin crack cyber crimes as well as hiring hackers to tap into the cyber underworld.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect is interrogated about a shocking and elaborate hoax; an NFL Hall of Famer breaks the law and pays the price; a murder suspect reveals the truth about the disappearance of his one-time girlfriend.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A teen couple must answer for a father's murder; a wife tries to explain why she was caught arranging to have her husband killed; the truth about the shocking death of a pregnant woman comes to light.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After meeting at a salsa club, Lulu and Ramon Sosa find they make a good team and marry. But after having financial difficulties, the relationship breaks down.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut
